eu.wauz.wauzcore.arcade

Class ArcadeLobby

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.arcade.ArcadeLobby

  • public class ArcadeLobby
extends java.lang.Object
    The static lobby for the arcade mode.
    Author:
    Wauzmons
